mapper.update: UPDATE m_tb52_user_offthejob_detail SET UNIT_CHECKER = #{updatetb52Info.unit_checker}, UNIT_CHECK_DATE = #{updatetb52Info.unit_check_date}, UNIT_CHECK_VIEWS = #{updatetb52Info.unit_check_views}, UNIT_CHECK_RESULT = #{updatetb52Info.unit_check_result}, COUNTY_CHECKER = #{updatetb52Info.county_checker}, COUNTY_CHECK_DATE = #{updatetb52Info.county_check_date}, COUNTY_CHECK_VIEWS = #{updatetb52Info.county_check_views}, COUNTY_CHECK_RESULT = #{updatetb52Info.county_check_result}, DOWNTOWN_CHECKER = #{updatetb52Info.downtown_checker}, DOWNTOWN_CHECK_DATE = #{updatetb52Info.downtown_check_date}, DOWNTOWN_CHECK_VIEWS = #{updatetb52Info.downtown_check_views}, DOWNTOWN_CHECK_RESULT = #{updatetb52Info.downtown_check_result}, MINISTRY_CHECKER = #{updatetb52Info.ministry_checker}, MINISTRY_CHECK_DATE = #{updatetb52Info.ministry_check_date}, MINISTRY_CHECK_VIEWS = #{updatetb52Info.ministry_check_views}, MINISTRY_CHECK_RESULT = #{updatetb52Info.ministry_check_result}, CHECK_RESULT = #{updatetb52Info.check_result}, NOW_MARK = #{updatetb52Info.now_mark}, UPDATE_USER_ID = #{updatetb52Info.update_user_id}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updatetb52Info.update_date} WHERE APPLY_NO = #{updatetb52Info.apply_no} AND APPLY_NUMBER = #{updatetb52Info.apply_number}
